page.title: 11FORESTRY CONTINUED
page.content:
Delamere/Eddisbury {FORESTRY CONTINUED
Tourism. The forest provides an oasis in the middle of the Cheshire plain & is much enjoyed by visitors all year round. Car parking,picnicing & walking facilities are provided & horse riding can be enjoyed by permit. A permanent orienteering course is available for training & competitions with one major event allowed in the forest every month.
Education. There are two educational facilities available in the forest, a forest classroom at the main information centre near Old Pale Nursery, & Fox Howl Outdoor Education Centre-detailed on the next page.
